class.name: fr3_ros/JointPDController
class.description: A joint-space PD controller for testing purpose using Pinocchio.

class.name: fr3_ros/TaskJointPDController
class.description: A task space controller using joint-space PD control for testing purpose using Pinocchio.

class.name: fr3_ros/QPController
class.description: A QP-based controller testing purpose using Pinocchio and ProxSuite.

class.name: fr3_ros/WaypointController
class.description: A QP-based controller testing purpose using Pinocchio and ProxSuite.

class.name: fr3_ros/WaypointCBFController
class.description: A CBFQP-based controller testing purpose using Pinocchio and ProxSuite.

class.name: fr3_ros/CBFController
class.description: A CBFQP-based controller testing purpose using Pinocchio and ProxSuite.

class.name: fr3_ros/PolyPathController
class.description: A controller that uses polynomials to plan paths between waypoints.

class.name: fr3_ros/RepetitiveCalibController
class.description: A controller that performs a repetitive task for calibration purposes.

class.name: fr3_ros/JointVelocityController
class.description: A controller that controls the joint velocity for testing purposes.

class.name: fr3_ros/CartesianVelocityController
class.description: A controller that controls the end-effector velocity for testing purposes.

class.name: fr3_ros/KinematicCBFController
class.description: A kinematic controller that uses control barrier functions to ensure safety.
